remarks: Reduce the argument of a group multiple by modding out the order of the element.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jan-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Sep-2015.)
statement:
odcl.1 $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
odcl.2 $e |- O = ( od ` G ) $.
odid.3 $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
odid.4 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
odmod $p |- ( ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X /\ N e. ZZ ) /\ ( O ` A ) e. NN ) -> ( ( N mod ( O ` A ) ) .x. A ) = ( N .x. A ) ) $.
